mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, RESIDENT_NO AS residentNo, ADDRESS FROM USERS WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
SELECT USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, RESIDENT_NO AS residentNo, ADDRESS FROM USERS WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname}
SELECT USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, RESIDENT_NO AS residentNo, ADDRESS FROM USERS JOIN PARTICIPATION ON TEAM.TEAM_ID = PARTICIPATION.TEAM_ID WHERE TEAM.TEAM_ID = #{teamId}
SELECT TEAM.TEAM_ID, NAME, CREATOR, ADDRESS FROM TEAM JOIN PARTICIPATION ON TEAM.TEAM_ID = PARTICIPATION.TEAM_ID WHERE PARTICIPATION.USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, NICKNAME, RESIDENT_NO, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{residentNo}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = #{password}, NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, RESIDENT_NO = #{residentNo}, ADDRESS = #{address} WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
